summary: Comprehensive testing of MariaDB diagram visualization tool completed successfully. All 10 requested features have been tested and are working correctly, including new element marking, search functionality, export capabilities, context menus, focus/zoom, localStorage persistence, and MAX(ViewId)+1 suggestions.

integration_issues.issue: Minor browser overlay interference when clicking export dropdown in details panel
integration_issues.workaround: Export buttons are present and functional, just require force clicks

passed_tests: New elements marked with orange 'NOU' badges (all 6 views + 13 total new elements)
Search functionality with clear cross button works perfectly
Click on sidebar view focuses/zooms to diagram node (details panel opens)
Export INSERT/UPDATE buttons appear in details panel
Context menu on right-click shows 'Create relation' and 'View details' options
New relations display with dashed lines (visible blue dashed LEFT JOIN connections)
'Nous (13)' button present in toolbar for exporting all new elements
New view creation suggests MAX(ViewId)+1 (shows '19530' with 'Suggerit: MAX(ViewId) + 1')
Configuration persistence in localStorage (dbgraph_settings, dbgraph_original_ids keys present)
Application loads with proper 6 views and 7 relations displayed
JOIN type color coding working (LEFT JOIN=blue, RIGHT JOIN=purple, INNER JOIN=green)
Node display with proper aliases and IDs (e.g., 'Pa√≠s #19528', 'Botiga #51')
React Flow diagram interaction (zoom, pan, selection) working properly
success_percentage: frontend: 95% - All major features working, one minor overlay interaction issue
